main.java.indexer.server.daos

Class ProjectDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.indexer.server.daos.ProjectDAO

  • public class ProjectDAO
extends java.lang.Object

    Used to access the Projects table in the database. Has all needed CRUD operations.
